about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm Carlos Andr√©s, petroleum engineer and AI specialist. This is my digital portfolio. üõ¢Ô∏è

intro.paragraph1: I'm a petroleum engineer with solid field operations experience and specialization in artificial intelligence for reservoir characterization. I've been optimizing subsurface decisions since 2013 and applying practical AI in recent years.
intro.paragraph2: With over 9 years of experience, I combine solid technical knowledge in petroleum engineering with advanced skills in machine learning and deep learning, transforming complex reservoir data into valuable insights for decision-making.

hero.name: Carlos Andr√©s Esquivel Plazas
hero.title: Petroleum Engineer | Specialist in Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence
hero.objective: Petroleum engineer with solid field experience and a strong interest in integrating machine learning and artificial intelligence solutions. My goal is to apply advanced technologies that optimize processes and improve operational efficiency in the oil and gas industry.

about.title: Professional Profile
about.description: Petroleum engineer with solid experience in field operations and comprehensive subsurface data analysis. Specialized in developing advanced technology solutions based on machine learning and AI, focused on process automation and improving operational outcomes. Successfully led initiatives to reduce report turnaround times and developed predictive models to support accurate technical decisions in petrophysical workflows. Proficient in Python, MATLAB, and key AI frameworks, combining operational expertise with leadership of multidisciplinary teams and a drive to innovate with emerging technologies in the energy sector.

highlights.title: 4+ years in operations
highlights.description: Wellsite and wireline operations (P/T tests, well testing, QHSE)

highlights.title: 3+ years applying Python & ML
highlights.description: NDT inspection and well log prediction

highlights.title: 9+ years bridging operations
highlights.description: Field operations and AI for subsurface decision-making

items.institution: Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning Career
items.details: Advanced ML and AI techniques, Deep Learning, neural networks and clustering algorithms applied to the petroleum industry.
Advanced English usage for effective communication in multicultural and professional environments.

experience.title: Experience
experience.subtitle: My professional journey combining petroleum operations with AI.

responsibilities: Development of complete machine learning pipelines for petrophysical analysis using TensorFlow and RAPIDS
Implementation of optimized neural networks with K-fold cross-validation and Bayesian optimization
Automation of well log analysis processes with GPU-accelerated processing
Technical consulting in AI applications for reservoir characterization and operational optimization
Coordinated workflows in three specialized areas optimizing operational processes
Implemented improvements that reduced delivery times from 15-20 minutes to 5-10 minutes
Managed multicultural teams of up to 25 people in high-demand environment (400+ daily orders)
Developed leadership and operational management skills in multicultural, high-pressure environment
Developed computer vision system for automatic recognition of industrial tools
Implemented complete solution in Python with OpenCV and machine learning frameworks
Achieved 40% reduction in report preparation time through intelligent automation
Optimized workflows eliminating manual processing errors and improving traceability
Designed and developed relational databases in SQL Server for technical information management
Implemented data analysis models using MATLAB and advanced Excel for strategic reports
Automated ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) processes improving efficiency by 60%
Established digital document management protocols optimizing information access and retrieval
Executed specialized wireline and well testing operations in oil and gas wells
Supervised pressure and temperature tests (build-up, drawdown, injection and interference)
Implemented QA/QC protocols to ensure formation data integrity and reliability
Improved operational procedures achieving 99% reliability in memory logs
Provided technical and analytical support ensuring QHSE standards compliance
Evaluated and optimized operational processes implementing ISO 9001 integrated management system
Developed operational procedure improvements reducing execution times by 25%
Established performance metrics and KPIs for continuous operational quality monitoring

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: Development of innovative solutions using AI and ML.

items.title: Synthetic Well Log Curve Prediction
items.description: Designed machine learning and deep learning models in Python to predict synthetic well log curves (e.g., CNLS, RHOB, Formation) with up to 5√ó more accuracy than previous methods. Developed an interactive interface to allow technical and non-technical users to evaluate zones with missing or limited data, improving petrophysical assessments and reducing analysis time.

items.title: Automated Technical Reporting with Computer Vision (Luna Project)
items.description: Built a Python-based computer vision system for large-scale inspection of oilfield tools, using nondestructive testing (NDT) image analysis. Integrated AI models to detect defects and link image evidence to structured databases, significantly reducing manual errors and speeding up technical reporting.

items.title: Water Influx Detection in Reservoirs
items.description: Developed a MATLAB tool to identify water breakthrough in oil reservoirs using pressure test data and boundary condition simulations. Implemented pseudopressure analysis and calculated drainage area and original oil in place (OOIP). The tool helped reduce reserve estimation errors and improved water management and reservoir characterization under complex boundary conditions.

skills.title: Tech Stack
skills.subtitle: Tools and technologies I master to solve complex problems.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Interested in collaborating on AI projects for the energy industry?
contact.description: I love connecting with professionals who share my passion for applying emerging technologies in the petroleum industry. If you have an interesting project or simply want to discuss AI applied to petroleum engineering, don't hesitate to contact me.
